name: Among The Living
description:
This is my first (indie) game made completely from scratch. It is a zombie survival game with 2 games and 4 different guns that can be bought using an in-game currency that players collect as they play. There are multiple different types of enemies and obstacles that players will need to traverse in order to make it to higher rounds.

Doesn't work on Mac but I will update it as soon as I can for Mac users.
